pkgmetadata.longdescription: Connect and Work with Clinical Trials Data Sources // Are you spending too much time fetching and managing clinical trial data? Struggling with complex queries and bulk data extraction? What if you could simplify this process with just a few lines of code? Introducing 'clintrialx' - Fetch clinical trial data from sources like 'ClinicalTrials.gov' https://clinicaltrials.gov/ and the 'Clinical Trials Transformation Initiative - Access to Aggregate Content of ClinicalTrials.gov' database https://aact.ctti- clinicaltrials.org/, supporting pagination and bulk downloads. Also, you can generate HTML reports based on the data obtained from the sources!
